Name: Dungeon Throne
About the game: Story: The unknown and magical appearance of dungeons, one day, transforms your world. Your kingdom, your home, is destroyed. The few survivors are trapped and deprived of liberty. Your bravery and adventurous spirit that characterize you will help achieve your escape, rescue prisoners and destroy the dungeons in this world full of action, magic and fantasy . Procedural generation: From decorations to entire layouts each dungeon you visit will be unique . Dynamic lighting: May those pixels shine! Artifacts: Gather artifacts from the dungeons you raid and improve throughout your adventure. Use different spells: Slay your enemies in different ways, adapt to every situation Bosses: At the end of each dungeon its guardian awaits for you, this represents a true challenge and its crucial that you use both your abilities and reflexes to the maximum of its capabilities to survive. Features: Over 100 room layouts 5 Bosses 10 Spells 11 Passive upgrades 40 Artifacts 12 Enemies
